trans-unit.source: Provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una estructura de permisos que permite que los métodos o clases obtengan acceso a los archivos de configuración.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> class provides a permission structure that allows methods or classes to access configuration files.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> clase proporciona una estructura de permisos que permite a métodos o clases para tener acceso a archivos de configuración.

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> provides ways to resolve multiple permissions values through such methods as <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Además, <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> proporciona maneras de resolver distintos valores de permisos a través de métodos como <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Union%2A> y <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission.Intersect%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The permission level to grant.
trans-unit.target: Nivel de permiso que se va a conceder.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="state" /> is neither <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> nor <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="state" /> no es <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> ni <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object with the same permission level.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> con el mismo nivel de permiso.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> with the same permission level.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> con el mismo nivel de permiso.

trans-unit.source: The configuration element from which the permission state is read.
trans-unit.target: Elemento de configuración del que se lee el estado del permiso.

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the permission state from XML.
trans-unit.target: Lee el valor del estado del permiso del código XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="unrestricted" /> attribute for the given <paramref name="securityElement" /> is neither <see langword="true" /> nor <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El atributo <see langword="unrestricted" /> para el parámetro <paramref name="securityElement" /> dado no es <see langword="true" /> ni <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The object containing the permissions to perform the intersection with.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene los permisos con el que se va a realizar la intersección.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical intersection between the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object and a given object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la intersección lógica entre el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> y un objeto dado que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: The logical intersection between the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> and a given object that implements <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Intersección lógica entre <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> y un objeto dado que implementa <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the `target` parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la firma del método acepta cualquier objeto que implementa el <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interfaz, un <xref:System.ArgumentException> excepción se producirá si una llamada a la <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> método en el objeto al que hace referencia el `target` no devuelve el parámetro <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not typed as <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> no es del tipo <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto con el que se va a comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object with an object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Compara el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> con un objeto que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the permission state is equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el estado del permiso es igual; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Although the method signature accepts any object that implements the <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interface, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception will be thrown if calling the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method on the object referenced by the `target` parameter does not return <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la firma del método acepta cualquier objeto que implementa el <xref:System.Security.IPermission> interfaz, un <xref:System.ArgumentException> excepción se producirá si una llamada a la <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> método en el objeto al que hace referencia el `target` no devuelve el parámetro <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If the object referenced by the `target` parameter is `null`, the comparison is done between the permission state of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> object and the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None> value of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Si el objeto al que hace referencia el `target` parámetro es `null`, la comparación se realiza entre el estado del permiso de la <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> objeto y el <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.None> valor de la <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not typed as <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> no es del tipo <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the permission state for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object is the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> value of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Indica si el estado del permiso para el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> es el valor <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the permission state for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el estado del permiso para <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> es el valor <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" /> de <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> object with attribute values based on the current <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> con valores de atributo basados en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> with attribute values based on the current <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityElement" /> con valores de atributo basados en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The object to perform the union with.
trans-unit.target: Objeto con el que se va a realizar la unión.

trans-unit.source: Returns the logical union of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> object and an object that implements the <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la unión lógica del objeto <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> y un objeto que implementa la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: The logical union of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> and an object that implements <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Unión lógica de <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" /> y un objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.Security.IPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not typed as <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> no es del tipo <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission" />.
